Author: lemonye
Text: Water retention, bowel movements, where you are in your cycle determines a lot. Weight fluctuates daily and it's not reasonable to look at weight loss short term, because fat loss takes longer to achieve.   I suggest weighing yourself three days in a row, taking the average. Then wait a week, weigh yourself the three days in a row and do an average of the 3 days and compare. Then you get a more accurate picture
